r.s: Fast and Safe little cache system
r.d: This package is a little cache system optimized for file containers. It is fast and safe (because it uses file locking and/or anti-corruption tests).
r.n: New features : - hashed cache directory structure with the choice of the level (thanks to Mike Benoit (ipso at snappymail dot ca)) - new options for cleaning the cache ("not in group", "too old"...) (thanks to dontilooksweetandinnocent@ambience.ru) - automatic cleaning of too old cache files based on a customisable "random method"
